name: FREE MARKET AMERICA
description: To educate about free market concepts with regard to how they relate to gov't regulations.
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for Congress to reassert its authority over government funding and programs through a full use of its Article I powers under the U.S. Constitution.
Advocating for Congress to reassert its authority over government funding and programs through a full use of its Article I powers under the U.S. Constitution.
Lobbying Members to reassert Article I over spending decisions and to rein in the regulatory excesses of the Executive Branch and federal government employees.
Suggested reforms to the Endangered Species Act by requiring science standards.

Advocated for passage and support of the Merit Act (H.R. 559) to streamline the firing and removal of federal employees for misconduct or poor performance.
